string.value: You feel stronger, but you still have a long way to go. Talk to #b#p1052001##k again for training.
#p1052001# says the best way to learn is to keep hunting monsters. He says to hunt #r50 #o130100#s#k. \n\n#o130100# #r#a21411##k
Fifty #o130100#s, slain and looted. You reported the news to #p1052001#.
흠. 애송이 도적의 기량이 전보다는 나아진 것 같군. 그래봤자오십보 백보지만 말이야. 아직 한참 멀었어. 아무래도 이 다크로드의 수련을 계속 받지 않으면 안 되겠는걸? 어때? 수련을 해보겠는가?
그렇다면 스텀프 50마리를 사냥해 보라고. 한 번 사냥해 본 몬스터이니 별로 어렵지는 않겠지. 스텀프를 계속 사냥해서 기초수련을 보다 확실히 한 후 다시 이곳으로 와서 보고하라고.
스스로의 힘으로도 수련할 자신이 있다면, 그렇게 해보라고. 얼마나 할 수 있을지는 모르겠지만 말이야.
Hmm. You seem to be improved. That doesn't make a big difference though. You have a long way to go. You should be trained by #p1052001#. What do you think? Would you like to go for a training?
Then hunt #r50 #o130100##k. You have hunted these monsters before. It won't be hard. Keep hunting #o130100# and make sure you master a basic training. Then let me know.
If you train by yourself, do it. I wonder how long you can do that.
You killed 50 #o130100#s. That's not bad. You just began and that's good. Hmm? What is that face? Do you believe that you did something great? Don't be proud of yourself. You have a long way to go.
I'll call you when you need another training session. Until we meet again...keep training hard!
You haven't eliminated #r50 #o130100#s#k. You can handle them. Don't be afraid, fight!
